abstract: To assuage the feelings of the 200,000 customers who purchased HD DVD players from a Best Buy store, the company will announce Wednesday that it is giving each buyer a $50 gift card.
snippet: To assuage the feelings of the 200,000 customers who purchased HD DVD players from a Best Buy store, the company will announce Wednesday that it is giving each buyer a $50 gift card.
lead_paragraph: When a line of consumer electronics is curtailed, it’s often the retailer that gets the blame for pushing that “piece of junk” in the first place.

headline.main: HD DVD Owners, Some Stores Want to Make Amends
